changes: feat(ui): The cash bag animation now appears to go behind the 'Total Haul' box, creating a sense of depth.
feat(ui): The 'Total Haul' value now animates with a 'rolling' number effect when a milestone is passed.
feat(ui): The 'Total Haul' value is now updated when the cash bag animation completes, creating a more satisfying visual effect.
fix(gameplay): Corrected a critical regression where the in-game 'Total Haul' was not updating to reflect the value of the most recently passed milestone.
fix(ui): Re-implemented the missing cash bag animation, ensuring it plays when a milestone is passed.
fix(armory): Fixed a `SyntaxError` caused by a missing state management function (`setTotalAccumulatedCash`) that prevented the armory from loading.
refactor(state): Consolidated state management functions to prevent future naming collisions.

fix(build): Added a cache-busting query parameter to the main script import to prevent stale code from being loaded by the browser.
fix(daily-challenge): Resolved a SyntaxError caused by a missing export for the showCountdown function.
feat(ui): Displayed `totalAccumulatedCash` at the top of the Armory panel for better visibility of funds available for skill upgrades.
feat(ui): Added a new `div` with ID `totalCashDisplay` in `index.html` to house the cash value.
refactor(armory): Updated `js/ui-modules/armory.js` and `js/dom-elements.js` to correctly populate and export the `totalCashDisplay` element.
feat(ui): The in-game info panel now dynamically displays gamepad controls when a controller is connected, and reverts to keyboard/mobile controls when disconnected.
feat(gamepad): The info icon is now a focusable element, allowing gamepad users to open and close the info panel.

feat(gamepad): Remapped the gamepad controls to feature more impressive skills: `X` button triggers Meteor Strike, `Y` button triggers Firestorm, Left Trigger triggers Houdini, and Right Trigger triggers Fiery Ground Pound.
docs(ui): Updated the in-game info panel to reflect the new, dynamic gamepad control scheme and updated button assignments.
docs: Updated the in-game info panel to include all keyboard and mobile gesture commands.
feat(gameplay): Implemented a feature to automatically pause the game and its audio when the browser tab loses focus or is minimized.
feat(privacy): Enhanced user privacy by preventing the game from running in the background, which could potentially capture audio or screen information without the user's knowledge.
fix(ux): Improved the user experience by preventing the game from continuing to play audio when the user has switched to another tab or locked their screen.
feat(gameplay): Added full gamepad support for gameplay and UI navigation.
feat(gameplay): Created a new `gamepad.js` module to handle all controller input, running in a separate loop to ensure responsiveness.
feat(ui): Implemented UI navigation via D-pad, allowing selection of buttons and dropdowns.
feat(ui): Added a UI indicator to show when a gamepad is connected.
feat(gameplay): Mapped all core player moves to an intuitive controller layout, including bumpers and triggers.
feat(gameplay): Added a gamepad cheat code (Left + Right Bumper) to grant maximum energy.
feat(gameplay): Unified the 'Back' button and 'Escape' key behavior to intelligently exit fullscreen or reset the game.
fix(gamepad): Resolved multiple cross-browser compatibility issues, ensuring D-pad navigation works in both Chrome and Edge.
fix(gamepad): Fixed numerous state management bugs that caused the controller to become unresponsive after pausing, resetting, or changing button mappings.
feat: Added new special skill: 'Mage-Spinner'. This skill combines the effects of the Fire-Spinner and Fire-Mage, automatically casting fireballs at nearby obstacles.
feat: Added visual effects for the Mage Spinner, including a fiery glow, embers, and orbiting fireballs.
feat: Added the ability to manually cast fireballs by pressing the skill key ('U') while Mage Spinner is active.
docs: Added the Mage-Spinner keybinding to the keyboard controls in the info panel.
fix: Fixed a critical syntax error in `js/main.js` by correcting the placement of several code blocks.
fix: Fixed multiple `ReferenceError`s across several files by importing necessary constants.
fix: Fixed a bug preventing manual fireballs from being cast during Mage Spinner.
perf: Lowered the energy cost of the Mage Spinner from 100 to 80.

functionality. The button now unlocks all Armory skills in addition to all Personas, providing a more comprehensive testing tool.
